title: Designing My Portfolio/Blog: A Dynamic Structure for Developers
shortDescription: Discover how I designed a portfolio/blog with a modular and dynamic structure.
intro: In this article, I will present the design of my portfolio/blog and how it is structured to facilitate content addition.

impressions.title: General Impressions
impressions.details: Creating this portfolio has been an enriching adventure that allowed me to apply my web development skills.

experience.title: Gained Experience
experience.details: I learned to create a modular structure where each article is in its own folder, simplifying content management.

improvements.title: Areas for Improvement
improvements.details: Using translations and a dynamic structure required special attention to file management.

suggestions.title: Suggestions for the Future
suggestions.details: I recommend using this modular approach for other projects as it facilitates maintenance and scalability.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.details: I hope this article inspires you to adopt a similar structure for your own projects.
